General_Description: '''Mapping Out''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''There is a [[Pond of Tainaros|pond]] in the south of the [[Chasms of Taygetos]] where rocks are arranged to look like a map. A reward is hidden on this map marking your current location.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
